org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.message

Class MessageSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.message.MessageSerializer

  • public class MessageSerializer
extends Object
    Utility class for serializing Messages. Messages are all serialized a similar way. 1. 4 byte little endian message header prefix 2. FB serialized Message: This includes it the body length, which is the serialized body and the type of the message. 3. Serialized message. For schema messages, the serialization is simply the FB serialized Schema. For RecordBatch messages the serialization is: 1. 4 byte little endian batch metadata header 2. FB serialized RowBatch 3. Padding to align to 8 byte boundary. 4. serialized RowBatch buffers.
